item.description: I really enjoyed the band's first album and am excited that they will be back in town for another show! (If you purchase a ticket to the Paradise show through their website you can also pre-order a digital download of their newest album for $5. http://tixx1.artistarena.com/rarariot/).  Tentative plan is that I will be at the Sunset Cantina at  8:30pm (w/an ETA at the Paradise ~9:30pm) if anyone is interested in hanging out prior to the show.  A day prior to the show, I will send out an email with updated details and my cell #.
item.name: Ra Ra Riot
